name: Eat Them All Bug Mountain
description:
This game was created for the ScoreSpace #9 Game Jam

The Theme was Climbing and indeed you play as a Monkey who climb a mountain. 

Use WASD or arrows to move and spacebar to use your special action. You must climb up to find the delicious insects and get further on the mountain.

You can also use a controller !

Try to get the best Score !

Programmers/Graphists : Yagneel and Yelkhenzil
